mapper.insert: INSERT INTO phong ( iddmphong, giobatdau, gioketthuc, ngay, songuoi, mucdich, nguoidaidien ) VALUES ( #{idDmPhong}, TIME_FORMAT(#{gioBatDau},'%H:%i:00'), TIME_FORMAT(#{gioKetThuc},'%H:%i:00'), STR_TO_DATE(#{ngay}, '%d/%m/%Y'), #{soNguoi}, #{mucDich}, #{nguoiDaiDien} )
INSERT INTO chitietphong ( idphong, tennguoidung, mssv, lop ) VALUES ( #{idPhong}, #{tenNguoiDungDetails}, #{mssvDetails}, #{lopDetails} )
mapper.select: SELECT ph.idphong, TIME_FORMAT(ph.giobatdau,'%H:%i') AS giobatdau, TIME_FORMAT(ph.gioketthuc,'%H:%i') AS gioketthuc, IFNULL(DATE_FORMAT(ph.ngay,'%d/%m/%Y'),'') AS ngay, tt.trangthai, ph.songuoi, ph.mucdich, nd.ten AS tennguoidaidien FROM phong ph LEFT JOIN dmtrangthai tt ON ph.trangthai = tt.idtrangthai LEFT JOIN nguoidung nd ON ph.nguoidaidien = nd.idnguoidung WHERE ph.iddmphong = #{idDmPhong} AND ph.ngay >= now() ORDER BY ph.ngay

SELECT ph.idphong, dm.tenphong, TIME_FORMAT(ph.giobatdau,'%H:%i') AS giobatdau, TIME_FORMAT(ph.gioketthuc,'%H:%i') AS gioketthuc, IFNULL(DATE_FORMAT(ph.ngay,'%d/%m/%Y'),'') AS ngay, tt.trangthai, ph.songuoi, ph.mucdich FROM phong ph LEFT JOIN dmtrangthai tt ON ph.trangthai = tt.idtrangthai LEFT JOIN dmphong dm ON ph.iddmphong = dm.iddmphong WHERE nguoidaidien = #{nguoiDaiDien} ORDER BY ph.ngay
SELECT ctp.tennguoidung, ctp.mssv, ctp.lop FROM chitietphong ctp WHERE ctp.idphong = #{idPhong};
mapper.delete: DELETE ph, ctp FROM phong ph JOIN chitietphong ctp ON ctp.idphong = ph.idphong WHERE ph.idphong = #{idPhong}
